import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import "./sidebar.css" export default function Sidebar() { const [cat, setCat] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getCats = async () => { const res = await axios.get("/categories") setCat(res.data) } }, []) return (
